snippet.title: Spiritfarer: Farewell Edition Trailer (ESRB)
snippet.description:
**Available NOW on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox One, PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, Steam, Epic Games Store, Stadia, and GOG!** 

The Spiritfarer® Farewell Edition is the definitive edition of the award-winning cozy management game about dying. It brings together the base game beloved by over 1 million players, and all the additional content released to date. 

Play as Stella, ferrymaster to the deceased. Build a boat to explore the world, then befriend and care for spirits before finally releasing them into the afterlife. See why critics called Spiritfarer one of the Best Games of 2020!

Buy now on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/972660/Spiritfarer/?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=Video%20Description&utm_campaign=Farewell%20Trailer&utm_content=Farewell%20Trailer

Social Links:
Website: https://thunderlotusgames.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThunderLotus
Facebook: https://facebook.com/ThunderLotusGames
Discord: http://discord.gg/tlg
Mailing List: https://thunderlotusgames.com/newsletter
